name: A Link Between Bodies
description:
An NES-style adventure with a twist. Mild chaos breaks out when the LINK between peace is captured and an imposter takes his place. Is the imposter able to capture the princess too? Will the hero of time wake up and foil the imposter's plans?

Music by Abdulaziz Alsheikh.

Created for the Brackeys GameJam ending on 29th August 2021, 12:00pm CET.
